titles.title: Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission Act of 2002
To establish the Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/23/2002--Introduced. Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission Act of 2002 - Establishes the Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission to plan, develop, and execute programs and activities appropriate to commemorate the 400th anniversary of the voyage of Henry Hudson (the first European to sail up the Hudson River in the vessel Half Moon), the 200th anniversary of the voyage of Robert Fulton (navigated the Hudson River in the steamboat Clermont, becoming the first person to use steam navigation on a commercial basis), and the 400th anniversary of the voyage of Samuel de Champlain (the first European to discover and explore Lake Champlain).
